job_history.work_description: Generated new accounts by implementing effective networking and content marketing strategies. Contacted new and existing customers to discuss how specific products could meet their needs. Answered customer questions regarding products, prices and availability. Generated new sales opportunities through direct and telephone selling and emails.

Contributed to a 75% increase in sales for the personal training department. Contributed to the operation of a clean, friendly and well maintained health club. Recorded training sessions and maintained package rates for each client. Encouraged clients to engage in group fitness classes and other activities in the gym to meet fitness goals.

Managed team of 12 of professionals. Surpassed revenue goals in four consecutive quarters. Met minimum monthly revenue, service and customer satisfaction goals. Devised and announced new classes and distributed guest passes to market the club.

Earned the Personal Trainer of the Month Award 5 consecutive months for most revenue earned each month. Monitored 30,000.00 project budgets each month. Mentored, coached and trained 8 team members. Recruited, hired and trained 4 new employees for sales and personal training.

skills.name: Sales and Marketing
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in sales and marketing, having generated new accounts and sales opportunities through various strategies, and consistently meeting or surpassing revenue goals.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has managed teams of up to 12 professionals, mentored and coached team members, and recruited, hired, and trained new employees, indicating expert-level leadership skills.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has experience in handling customer inquiries, discussing product needs, and providing excellent customer service, suggesting a strong proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has managed project budgets of up to $30,000 per month, indicating a strong proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Has managed teams of up to 12 professionals, indicating expert-level team management skills.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has consistently met or surpassed revenue goals, and managed multiple responsibilities, suggesting a strong proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience in communicating with customers, team members, and management, suggesting a strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Has trained and mentored team members, and recruited, hired, and trained new employees, suggesting a strong proficiency in training and development.
